description: Maple syrup and oatmeal are usually relegated to the breakfast table, but here they create a crowd-pleasing tart Creamy maple pudding would be lovely on its own, but truly shines nestled into a cookielike oatmeal crust Top it with a dollop of whipped cream laced with cinnamon and nutmeg.
title: Maple Tart With Oatmeal Cookie Crust
title_page: Maple Tart With Oatmeal Cookie Crust Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: Maple syrup and oatmeal are usually relegated to the breakfast table, but here they create a crowd-pleasing tart. Creamy maple pudding would be lovely on its own, but truly shines nestled into a cookielike oatmeal crust. Top it with a dollop of whipped cream laced with cinnamon and nutmeg.
